name: @rcus
description:
Your dad has got lost again, and it's up to you to go find him. You might as well try to collect as much gold as you can on the way. 

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to draw your bow and fire. 

Features
- 7 unique levels
- 3 flavours of slime
- sneks and bats
- your dad

Changelog
17th March
– Music now loops
– Fixed enemies spawning next to player

12th March
– Fixed a bug where some items and enemies would persist between levels
– Fixed a bug where the previous level was visible out-of-bounds
– Reduced turn delay
